scoring_strategy: provide score 0 to 10 on following statements with 0 being low evidence and 10 being high evidence
question: This gene is involved in mediating the innate immune response within TNBC tumors
This gene is involved in mediating the adaptive immune response within TNBC tumors
This gene plays a role in tumor angiogenesis or blood vessel formation in TNBC
This gene is involved in influencing the tumor microenvironment, such as fibroblast recruitment or extracellular matrix remodeling, in TNBC
